text: <@U15HY5TG8> What kind of peripherals do you use?
You’d have to switch to all USB-C
Peripherals? Lol
mice
keyborad
flash drive
etc
anything that goes into a port into your computer
Mr computer science major
Wtf i didnt see these messages lol and just connecting my phone to the computer and then my display port. I think thats it
And obviously flash drive
So you'd have to get a USB C to HDMI and a USB c to USB A
Das some horse manure
Lol
Why didnt they keep a fucking hdmi port? Are there tvs with usb c on it?
Not yet. But USB C carries video
Carries it better than hDMI
Well wtf
Yea but it doesnt matter if tvs dont have them yet
True. But monitors are starting to have them
See im not mad about them putting on usb c but why not leave a couple ports on them? Subtract a usb a and put on a usb c. To make a gradual switch
Why does gradual look like its spelled wrong
Yeah thats what a lot of people are asking
Also the escape only has 2 USB c ports
Thats my only problem. Apple just made (for some people) everything in their office useless
The touch bar has 4
Thats fine. I only need a display port and one usb c
True. They think they're moving tech forward though

I mean, they are but itd be like the govt saying alright everyone, we're introducing a new car brand that will only be battery powered and its the only car you can use. Now everyone has to toss their gas powered cars and spend more money on a car that they might not necessarily need
Nope. Awful analogy
Eh
Not awful
But not good
Its not awful
But not good
But it works. It forces people to suddenly change what they need way too quickly
Does not force
You don't need to buy a Mac
Or at least you don't need to buy their laptops
They desktops still offer USB a and display ports
It forces you if youre accustomed to macs
Then you should be accustomed to their rapid tech shifts
Yea well...i watch porn in bed
Nah
Use an iPad
Also not going to buy an ipad
That sounds like a you problem
Theyre useless to me
Obviously not
An ipad is for someone with a business
Thats all i see
Whaaaaaaaaaa?
That's an interesting perspective! What makes you say that?
Study
Ehhh
Ipads make sense for reading quick company info, filling out forms, using the card reader attachment and signing your name for an e-signature.
Beyond that, nah, ill just pull out my laptop because its easier to type on, print off of, etc
I think iPads are great for absorbing content
Reading news, catching up on reddit, Netflix, responding to email,
YouTube
Porn
Thats what im saying but i move around muuuuch quicker on my laptop
I think an iPad is a lot better for using in bed, on the couch, walking around the house, in the kitchen, doing laundry, etc.
I just convinced myself to buy a desktop as my next computer and an iPad Pro 12.9”
See i have to disagree with couch and bed but the others are sorta valid
I used my iPad to watch Barry last night in bed. It was surprisingly nice.
It’s easier to keep an iPad on your coffee table than your computer.
How so
It’s also easier to keep your iPad next to your bed than your computer
Disagree
Fair enough.
To me, they take up relatively close to the same amount of room, except now you dont have a physical keyboard and the screen wont stay propped up on its own
You don’t need a keyboard on the iPad
And thats where i said i move muuuch quicker on my laptop. I can type so much faster
iPad is for absorbing content.
And use the trackpad
Not creating content
You use the trackpad faster than you can point and tap?
That doesn’t sound right.
Im talking about navigating to and from different pages too. Not just clicking on a picture or scrolling on the same page
So: searching in the search bar, entering websites, adding tabs, switching between tabs, forward and back buttons
Okie dokie. I think we use our devices differently. To each their own I suppose.
Now im curious how you believe the ipad is faster based on my criteria or do you just not use your ipad like that
The only thing slower is typing. Everything else you adding tabs, switching between tabs, forward and back buttons are all one tap
Most of the time I don't find myself searching. If I do it's for a second to find some chords and I've never thought my computer was necessarily better I suppose.
Typing is the number one thing that pisses me off so thats why
That's fair

Reddit is just scrolling and tapping on images, news is just scrolling and tapping, Netflix is just scrolling and tapping, etc. For me an iPad is just a better form factor for reading, watching video, and browsing other sorts of media such as images
True true. Idk i guess the other thing is i dont like holding onto things
